_aChangeLog.text: fixed numerous skips possible on autobhop
fixed a possible crash for some people
time to revisit the secret room for your $20 DLC content!
please kill me im so done with this ancient software
added a player clip because fuck your breathing rooms during bhop sections
thanks to serz for helpful and comprehensive post <3

_sText:
Because scroll is as dead as you want it to be!

A scroll/kz map with gameplay that is mostly unique, featuring some jump ideas i do not see often or haven't seen at all before. The design revolves around themes i associate with solitude and loneliness. Main route should be around medium difficulty: technical but not hard on your strafes/perfs. There is also a medium-hard bonus made together with Flexlolo. Also some secrets sprinkled on top so you do not get bored quick! Intended for 100 aa, stamina, scroll, 250 runvel, etc.

Be warned that medium/low graphics settings cause issues. This should in no way affect gameplay though.

Special thanks to avocado for testing it with me!

This map uses a lot of custom assets. I used your model and forgot to credit you? Leave a comment and we will fix that.
